statement.p: Consider the note C4 which has frequency 277.183 Hz.
What is the period for C4?
What is the wavelength for C4?
Recall that the speed of sound is 1116 feet per second.

solution.p: Period is the inverse of frequency, so \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{277.183}}\approx{0.0036077248604712}\approx{0.00360772}.
Wavelength is a unit conversion: \displaystyle\frac{{{1116}\ \text{ ft}}}{{\text{second}}}\cdot\frac{{{1}\ \text{ second}}}{{{277.183}\ \text{ cycles}}}\approx{4.0262209442859}\approx{4.026}.
